code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl="https://api-groupomania.herokuapp.com/api/user";export default{signup:function signup(firstname,lastname,email,password){return axios.post(baseUrl+"/signup",{firstname:firstname,lastname:lastname,email:email,password:password});},login:function login(email,password){return axios.post(baseUrl+"/login",{email:email,password:password});},getProfile:function getProfile(headers){return axios.get(baseUrl+"/me",{headers:headers});},putProfile:function putProfile(data,headers){return axios.put(baseUrl+"/me",data,{headers:headers});},deleteAccount:function deleteAccount(headers){return axios.delete(baseUrl+"/me",{headers:headers});}};
